title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Cancel Culture Comes for Artists Who Posted About Charlie Kirk’s Death
items.description: A “South Park” episode was taken off air, a DC comic series was canceled, and several artists were fired in the aftermath of the shooting.

items.title: Save $70 on One of Our Favorite Android Tablets
items.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S10 FE, a solid mid-tier tablet, is now $430 on Amazon.

items.title: Pilot union urges FAA to reject Rainmaker’s drone cloud-seeding plan
items.description: Rainmaker wants to use flares to seed clouds — the airline pilots' union says it won't be safe.

items.title: Extremist Groups Hated Charlie Kirk. They’re Using His Death to Radicalize Others

items.title: Via shrugs off tepid open to end first day of trading slightly above IPO price
items.description: Transit tech software startup Via had its IPO debut on Friday, starting at below offering price before rising to close at nearly $50.
